name: Ninja Edge
description:
Ninja Edge is a two player local multiplayer competitive platformer based around a sci-fi setting. Fight your friends in brawler style combat in a closed arena, interactive environments with each stage varied and weapons to your disposal and become the ultimate ninja/edge lord

This game was to brought to you by the one and only; Awesome Rookie

Price: Free

Platform: Windows

___________________________________________________

Game Features

-Platformer

-Two player PVP (Local)

-5 varied levels

-Weapons Pick ups

-Interactive environments 

-Fast pace-Die instantly and respawn instantly

-Edgy Genji Mains

___________________________________________________

I'm just an artist trying hard to make a living.
